      • acknowledgeCheckpoint

        public void acknowledgeCheckpoint(long checkpointId)
        从接口复制的说明: Environment
        Confirms that the invokable has successfully completed all steps it needed to to for the checkpoint with the give checkpoint-ID. This method does not include any state in the checkpoint.
        指定者:
        acknowledgeCheckpoint 在接口中 Environment
        参数:
        checkpointId - The ID of the checkpoint.

      • acknowledgeCheckpoint

        public void acknowledgeCheckpoint(long checkpointId,
                                  StateHandle<?> state)
        从接口复制的说明: Environment
        Confirms that the invokable has successfully completed all steps it needed to to for the checkpoint with the give checkpoint-ID. This method does include the given state in the checkpoint.
        指定者:
        acknowledgeCheckpoint 在接口中 Environment
        参数:
        checkpointId - The ID of the checkpoint.
        state - A handle to the state to be included in the checkpoint.

      • declineCheckpoint

        public void declineCheckpoint(long checkpointId,
                              Throwable cause)
        从接口复制的说明: Environment
        Declines a checkpoint. This tells the checkpoint coordinator that this task will not be able to successfully complete a certain checkpoint.
        指定者:
        declineCheckpoint 在接口中 Environment
        参数:
        checkpointId - The ID of the declined checkpoint.
        cause - An optional reason why the checkpoint was declined.

      • failExternally

        public void failExternally(Throwable cause)
        从接口复制的说明: Environment
        Marks task execution failed for an external reason (a reason other than the task code itself throwing an exception). If the task is already in a terminal state (such as FINISHED, CANCELED, FAILED), or if the task is already canceling this does nothing. Otherwise it sets the state to FAILED, and, if the invokable code is running, starts an asynchronous thread that aborts that code.

        This method never blocks.

        指定者:
        failExternally 在接口中 Environment
